About me

I’m a professional focused on delivering modern, reliable web experiences. This site is built with semantic HTML5, responsive CSS, and accessibility best practices — ready to sit behind Cloudflare for performance and DDoS protection.

const menu = $('#nav-menu'); if (toggle && menu){ toggle.addEventListener('click', () => { const expanded = toggle.getAttribute('aria-expanded') === 'true'; toggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', String(!expanded)); menu.classList.toggle('show'); }); } // Year stamps const y = String(new Date().getFullYear()); const y1 = $('#year'); const y2 = $('#year2'); if (y1) y1.textContent = y; if (y2) y2.textContent = y; // Cookie banner (essential only) const CONSENT_KEY = 'cookie_consent_v1'; const banner = $('#cookie-banner'); const acceptBtn = $('#accept-cookies'); const showPolicyBtn = $('#show-policy'); function showBanner(){ banner?.classList.add('show'); } function hideBanner(){ banner?.classList.remove('show'); } if (!localStorage.getItem(CONSENT_KEY)){ // Delay a bit to avoid layout shift setTimeout(showBanner, 500); } acceptBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => { localStorage.setItem(CONSENT_KEY, 'accepted'); hideBanner(); }); showPolicyBtn?.addEventListener('click', () => { const details = document.querySelector('#legal details'); if (details && !details.open) details.open = true; window.scrollTo({ top: document.body.scrollHeight, behavior: 'smooth' }); }); // Cloudflare Turnstile example (uncomment to use) // window.onload = () => { // if (window.turnstile){ // turnstile.render('.cf-turnstile', { // sitekey: 'YOUR_TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY', // callback: function(token){ // console.log('Turnstile token:', token); // } // }); // } // }; })(); ``` --- ## /assets/logo.svg (placeholder) ```svg
